features: 💐【High Memory with 6GB RAM+64GB ROM】 Our Tablet is equipped with a highly integrated processor with 6GB（2GB+4GB)RAM, 64 GB ROM. Kids can get faster response speed and more memory storage space when using tablets, making them smoother and more worry -free.

💐【Full Google Service Access with Android 13】Our 10" tablet for kids is equipped with the latest version of the GMS-certified Android 13 operating system. The operation interface and application of children's tablets are usually very friendly, easy to learn and use, and can help children quickly adapt to the use of tablet equipment.

💐【Best Kid-friendly Companion】the toddler tablet has a child-specific mode with a simple interface and easy operation,which is pre-installed, a very useful and safe app for kids.You can also download many apps from Google play store, including lots of educational programs and fun games for kids.

💐【Dual Cameras and Battery Upgrade】Whether taking selfies or shooting videos, the kids tablet's cameras allow kids to explore and capture the world around them. The large battery capacity ensures that our tablet for kids can run for longer periods of time, suitable for traveling.

💐【Portable Kids Tablet with Protective Case】Our 10 inch kids tablet is slim and lightweight which fits easily in bags, backpacks and making it possible for you to take anywhere, anytime. Case is made of impact-resistant silicone material that protects the tablet from scratches, dirt and bumps, drops, dust, etc. The kids tablets is truly a wonderful gift for birthdays, Christmas, holiday seasons and more.
body.description: Best suitable for over 3 years old. 1. Pre-installed Kidoz and Familygroup app 2. Built-in high performance quad-core processor and Android 13 system. 3. 10 inch tablet for kids with low blue-light and wide view angle. A ideal gift for children. 4. With durable, lightweight silicone case to protect against drops, bumps, dirts etc. caused by kids while playing. Technical specifications: Display: 10 inch HD display Resolution: 1280*800 IPS Camera: 2.0 MP + 5.0MP Memory: 64 GB (expandable by up to 128 GB) Battery: 5000 mAh Package including： 1xTablet 1xUser Manual 1xType C Cable

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars WORKS GREAT & EASY TO USE
reviews.reviewText: This pink tablet comes with pre installed kids games. It has dual cameras. It has an attached display stand. It has parental controls. The case is very rugged and durable. The graphics are very nice quality and so is the sound quality. This tablet is very kid friendly and easy to use. It is a very nice 10 inch tablet. The tablet is fast and charges up fast. The price is great. It is very nice quality and very well made.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good kids tablet would recommend to anyone
reviews.reviewText: I dont usually write reviews on products but this ones has earned it. Absolutely love this little tablet, would 100% recommend this tablet would make a great gift for a child. It's easy for a child to use and has a thick childproff case. My 3 year old has had this table for a little over a month and it has gotten thrown multiple times and is still going strong. It loads fast the quality of this tablet is amazing. Definitely beats paying over 100 for a tablet that doesn't last and this one's affordable and works the same if not better than the name brand ones.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Affordable kids tablet with amazing case
reviews.reviewText: I bought this as a Christmas gift, my niece was happy to receive it. Tablet comes with KIDOZ app which has lots of content such as games, drawings, parental controls etc plus you have full access to Google App store and can download whatever you want. It offers multiple languages too. Screen quality is nice, decent screen resolution and quality images. The case is absolutely fantastic and nearly makes the tablet indestructible. It has a nice pop up kickstand for handsfree viewing experience. Affordable and good quality for the price, so far very happy customer

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little tablet
reviews.reviewText: Got this for my 3-year-old so she could watch movies and TV shows on it. It's small enough that she can carry it around on her own, the integrated stand is perfect for when she brings it to the table, she's able to use it completely on her own. Adding apps to it has been no trouble and although you're able to supervise it with an adult account we haven't really had to. It charges quickly and although the battery isn't going to last all day with watching movies, it's good enough to watch a couple of complete films and then go for a charge. Even with that being the case it's fine to just plug it in and continue using the tablet. Would buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This tablet is preferred over ipad by my daughter when at home. It works great and is able to support a wired headphone which doesn’t need to be recharged like the wireless ones the iPad has to have. My daughter is almost 5 and has no problem working it on her own. The speed and memory are good without frustration from my kid. The kickstand is nice also. The price is amazing for the quality. My only complaint is the ads on the android games but that has nothing to do with the actual tablet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars ROWT 10.1 inch Tablet for kids
reviews.reviewText: Rugged, easy to use with excellent RAM memory. Kids love it. WiFi is easy to use and kids can surf the internet without any difficulty. My granddaughter has dropped it a couple of times but the ROWT kids tablet remained scratch-less and kept operating normally. An excellent product well designed for the kids.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This tablet is perfect for what we need it for. Easy to set up, specs are great, you can download any apps plus there are built in apps that are great to use. The case is great! Has Bluetooth connection. You can get a good 2 and half hours of play time before you have to charge it again however in the description it says it's supposed to last up to 6 hours .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good for kids
reviews.reviewText: My god daughter loves her Christmas gift! The smile on her face warms my heart❤️ it’s kinda heavy, the case is very protective if it should fall! I would definitely recommend getting this with such a reasonable price to begin with.
